h2_title: Whiteclad Noble Boss Fight and Guide
content: In addition to this, he can twirl his spear above his head, summoning water above it before slamming it down, sending a straight line of water right at you that you can dodge to the side to avoid.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Whiteclad_Noble.md', within the main section titled 'Whiteclad Noble', specifically from the subsection 'Whiteclad Noble Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
In addition to this, he can twirl his spear above his head, summoning water above it before slamming it down, sending a straight line of water right at you that you can dodge to the side to avoid.
